title: Home Of Franklin D Roosevelt National Historic Site: Other Resources
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Other Resources              Other Resources       "FDR, Eleanor, and Teddy: Teaching the Roosevelts"  Blog by Dina Strasser      Hyde Park Trails & Your Classroom - Podcasting       The Bus Could Be On Us For Your Next Field Trip Hyde Park has a lot to offer students - but as you know only too well all the history, culture and nature in the world don't do students or teachers much good without bus money to get here. That's why the National Park Service and the FDR Presidential Library and Museum plan to cover bus fees for a limited number of students to visit Hyde Park.
